title: VR-Based Science Learning: Effective Teaching Method Development Utilizing Modality Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with VR device operation
context.additional_context: Pedagogical experimentation to optimize VR learning in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Students compare cognitive load between text/audio explanations in VR environments to select effective learning strategies.
Students identify interactive elements in VR simulations during scientific problem-solving with over 80% accuracy.
Students enhance selective attention by maintaining focus on core learning areas in VR environments for an average of two seconds or more.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
